splash_startsub_title: the most recognized astrologer in the whole world
amanda_amazing_vision: I see you came to me with a question in mind... You came to the right place. Please, answer a few questions to strengthen our connection.
amanda_your_dob: If you look back in life, would you consider yourself lucky?
amanda_your_gender: Have you ever been trully in love?
amanda_marital_status: Have you ever trully hated anyone?
amanda_signals: Yes.. I can see clearly now. How interesting..
amanda_would_you_future: I feel that you are over the age of 16 but I am obliged to ask for it. Are you over 16 years old?
amanda_private_secure: To keep it private, I will send my vision details on your mobile phone.
amanda_accept_tnc: Please click SMS NOW button and confrim your chosen aspect of the reading
question_text: What do you want to know about?
